videos.title: The Gun Club - The Las Vegas Story [Album]
videos.description:
Their third album, released in 1984 on Animal Records. This is the re-release from 2004 on Sympathy For The Record Industry.

1) Walkin' With The Beast 0:00
2) Eternally Is Here 04:52
3) The Stranger In Our Town 07:50
4) My Dreams 13:00
5) The Master Plan
